name: Kyle's Adventures
description:
This is a cool pixel-style platform game.

HISTORY

Kyle rests peacefully, until something mysterious falls from the sky and collides on the ground, splitting into pieces. After this event, Kyle runs to check the place and feels a strange energy in the surroundings. Thinking that the cause of this energy is the fragments of the mysterious item, Kyle begins his adventure by collecting all of them so that it doesn't affect anything or anyone.
